def has_clothes_in_basket(basket:item):
    # Function to check if there are clothes in the specified basket
    symbol has_clothes=exists item: item : is_clothes(item) and inside(item, basket)
    return has_clothes

def is_basket_for_ironing(basket:item):
    # Function to determine if its the basket containing clothes for ironing
    symbol ironing_basket=exists c: item : is_clothes(c) and inside(c, basket)
    return ironing_basket

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists basket: item : is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and is_basket_for_ironing(basket):
            # If we have already found the basket with clothes for ironing, move closer to it
            bind basket: item where:
                is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and is_basket_for_ironing(basket)
            achieve close_char(char, basket)

        else:
            # Check all baskets in the scene that have not been visited
            foreach basket: item:
                if is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and not visited(basket):
                    observe(basket, "Check is there any clothes for ironing in the basket")

Goal Representation:
behavior pick_up_clothes(clothes:item, iron:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(clothes)
        # Hold the item of clothing to iron it

behavior iron_clothes(clothes:item, ironing_board:item, iron:item):
    body:
        achieve on(clothes, ironing_board)
        # Place the clothes on the ironing board
        achieve is_on(iron)
        # Turn on the iron
        
behavior put_clothes_away(clothes:item, basket:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(clothes, basket)
        # Place the clothes back in the basket

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind basket: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and id[basket] == 2006
        # Select the clothes basket with ID 2006

        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select an ironing board
        
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select an iron
        
        foreach clothes: item:
            if is_clothes(clothes) and inside(clothes, basket):
                pick_up_clothes(clothes, iron)
                iron_clothes(clothes, ironing_board, iron)
                put_clothes_away(clothes, basket)
